reviewText: In my case one of the DVDs, namely, "Sisters", was defective, stopped and "stumbled" all the time, so I advise to keep the package before you check the whole set and not wait too long before you do it.

von Trotta is a super writer and director. Hope to be working with her soon. In my opinion her very best film is 'Rosa Luxemburg'; However it's not available is the USA. Amazon.de has a few copies with the original German dialogue. And it's is PAL not NTSC which is used in the USA.
